Name: DrakulA
About the game: On the borders of three states, in the midst of the Carpathian mountains, an ancient evil has awakened. Legend says once he was a human, now he is an undead. This may be the most dangerous journey a mortal has ever taken. I'm on my way to kill DRAKULA
